attributes.action: skilled worker route should have ILR within 5 years.
attributes.additional_details: I'm always been grateful for all the opportunities I got here. I loved staying here but leaving all the families and loved ones behind and can't live with them is really a tough time. We are already been prohibited from bringing dependents which was already very hard for most of us , every day start with that little hope that we gonna be live together after some time , 5 years is already a very long time , please don't make too hard by making it 10 . we should have the opportunity.
attributes.background: Skilled worker job is really a physical job. especially healthcare assistants as we are already been not allowed to get dependent so we have to wait for 10 years to be with our families and loved ones, I think after all this hard work we should deserve it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
